widget.name: ESB Lighting
widget.description:
Provides a schedule of the upcoming (and past) Empire State Building lightings.
The information is pulled from the official ESB website and provided as an extra service. This app consumes that service and displays the results.
Per default all available future data plus available past data (up to the last month's first day) is shown. You can load all available data on request(ESB provides a one year's history).
This is not an official ESB app!
widget.author: Michael Niessl
